revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Solaceon Ruins |image = [[File:Solaceon_Ruins.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Solaceon Ruins. |tokens = 62,500 |location = Off Route 209, east of Solaceon Town. }} '''Solaceon Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 960,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=5| <center>[[File:Ruin_Maniac.png|40px]]Ruin Maniac Karl || rowspan=5|<center> [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Bronzor |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Natu.png|40px]] Natu |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor |- | [[File:Hippopotas.png|40px]] Hippopotas |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[Solaceon Ruins#Unown Encounters in Solaceon Ruins|Unown (A) -> Unown (Z)]] || rowspan=7|<center>4,100,000 || rowspan=7 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- |}
==== Unown Encounters in Solaceon Ruins ==== 23 Unown Forms (A-Z, excluding F, H and P - seen below) can be found in Solaceon Ruins as Dungeon Bosses. One Unown form per day is randomly chosen to be the boss (switches at midnight).
[[File:Unown_(A).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(B).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(C).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(D).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(E).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(G).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(I).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(J).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(K).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(L).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(M).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(N).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(O).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Q).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(R).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(S).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(T).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(U).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(V).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(W).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(X).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Y).png|30px]] [[File:Unown_(Z).png|30px]]
